[00:00.00]The Box (Explicit) - Roddy Ricch
[00:07.92]Lyrics by：Rodrick Moore/Samuel Gloade/Adarius Moragne/Aqeel Qadir Tate/Larrance Dopson/Khirye Anthony Tyler
[00:15.85]Pullin' out the coupe at the lot
[00:17.31]Told 'em f**k 12 f**k SWAT
[00:19.03]Bustin' all the bells out the box
[00:20.40]I just hit a lick with the box
[00:22.00]Had to put the stick in the box mmh
[00:24.66]Pour up the whole d**n seal I'ma get lazy
[00:28.10]
[00:28.72]I got the mojo deals we been trappin' like the '80s
[00:32.69]She sucked a n***a soul gotta Cash App
[00:35.88]
[00:36.54]Told 'em wipe a n***a nose say slatt slatt
[00:40.00]
[00:40.63]I won't never sell my soul and I can back that
[00:44.57]And I really wanna know where you at at
[00:48.63]I was out back where the stash at
[00:50.51]Cruise the city in a bulletproof Cadillac
[00:52.29]Skrrt
[00:52.73]'Cause I know these n***as after where the bag at
[00:54.35]Yeah
[00:54.85]Gotta move smarter gotta move harder
[00:56.96]N***a try to get me for my water
[00:58.92]I'll lay his a*s down on my son on my daughter
[01:01.08]I had the Draco with me Dwayne Carter
[01:03.10]Lotta n***as out here playin' ain't ballin'
[01:05.27]I done put my whole arm in the rim Vince Carter
[01:07.37]Yeah
[01:07.80]And I know probably get a key for the quarter
[01:09.71]Shawty barely seen in double C's I bought 'em
[01:11.71]Got a b***h that's looking like Aaliyah she a model
[01:13.82]I got the pink slip all my whips is key-less
[01:17.96]Compton I'm about to get the key to the city
[01:19.93]Patek like the sea forgive me
[01:21.88]Pullin' out the coupe at the lot
[01:23.11]Told 'em f**k 12 f**k SWAT
[01:24.61]Bustin' all the bells out the box
[01:26.15]I just hit a lick with the box
[01:27.66]Had to put the stick in the box mmh
[01:30.25]Pour up the whole d**n seal I'ma get lazy
[01:33.69]
[01:34.28]I got the mojo deals we been trappin' like the '80s
[01:38.26]She sucked a n***a soul gotta Cash App
[01:41.50]
[01:42.13]Told 'em wipe a n***a nose say slatt slatt
[01:45.61]
[01:46.16]I won't never sell my soul and I can back that
[01:50.24]And I really wanna know where you at at hah
[01:54.85]Hahaha I been movin' 'em out
[01:56.84]If Steelo with me then he got the blues in the pouch
[01:58.72]Yeah
[01:59.02]Took her to the forest put the wood in her mouth
[02:00.97]B***h don't wear no shoes in my house
[02:03.07]The private I'm flyin' in I never wan' fly again
[02:04.97]I'll take my chances in traffic
[02:06.65]Yeah
[02:07.14]She suckin' on d**k no hands with it
[02:09.14]I just made the Rollie plain like a landing strip
[02:10.99]I'm a 2020 president candidate
[02:13.22]I done put a hundred bands on Zimmerman s**t
[02:15.11]I been movin' real gangster so that's why she picked a Crip
[02:17.21]Shawty call me Crisco 'cause I pop my s**t
[02:19.46]Got it out the mud there's nothin' you can tell me yeah
[02:23.62]When I had the d**gs I was street wealthy yeah
[02:27.31]Pullin' out the coupe at the lot
[02:28.90]Told 'em f**k 12 f**k SWAT
[02:30.25]Bustin' all the bells out the box
[02:31.82]I just hit a lick with the box
[02:33.34]Had to put the stick in the box mmh
[02:35.89]Pour up the whole d**n seal I'ma get lazy
[02:39.22]
[02:39.92]I got the mojo deals we been trappin' like the '80s
[02:43.95]She sucked a n***a soul gotta Cash App
[02:47.18]
[02:47.72]Told 'em wipe a n***a nose say slatt slatt
[02:51.28]
[02:51.88]I won't never sell my soul and I can back that
[02:55.81]And I really wanna know where you at at
data.trans:
[ti:The Box (Explicit)]
[ar:Roddy Ricch]
[al:Please Excuse Me for Being Antisocial (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:07.92]//
[00:15.85]在停车场从跑车里下来
[00:17.31]对他们说 去他的警察 去他的特警部队
[00:19.03]把所有东西统统摆出来
[00:20.40]我一路厮杀 发了大财
[00:22.00]我必须把武器藏起来
[00:24.66]来点特制饮料 我要放松心情
[00:28.10]
[00:28.72]我有很多生意要做 我们就像八十年代那样做街头生意
[00:32.69]她把男人伺候得很好 挣到了很多钱
[00:35.88]
[00:36.54]叫他们去干掉一个家伙 好兄弟一辈子
[00:40.00]
[00:40.63]我绝不会出卖灵魂 这一点我可以保证
[00:44.57]我真的想知道你在哪里
[00:48.63]我身边放着很多货
[00:50.51]开着防弹凯迪拉克在城市里巡游
[00:52.29]//
[00:52.73]因为我知道这些家伙哪儿有钱就跟到哪儿
[00:54.35]//
[00:54.85]必须放聪明点 必须更加努力
[00:56.96]谁要是想抢我的钻石
[00:58.92]我会干掉他 对我儿子发誓 对我女儿发誓
[01:01.08]我身上带着真家伙 随时保持警惕
[01:03.10]很多人虽然闹得凶 其实没什么钱
[01:05.27]我已经取得了辉煌的成就 突破了自己
[01:07.37]//
[01:07.80]我知道可能这一次我能闯出点大名堂
[01:09.71]姑娘没怎么见过香奈儿 我给她买了不少
[01:11.71]找了个看起来就像Aaliyah的姑娘 她是个模特
[01:13.82]我有的是钞票 我的车都不需要用钥匙启动
[01:17.96]康普顿 我很快就能得到这个城市的认可
[01:19.93]百达翡丽镶满了钻石
[01:21.88]在停车场从跑车里下来
[01:23.11]对他们说 去他的警察 去他的特警部队
[01:24.61]把所有东西统统摆出来
[01:26.15]我一路厮杀 发了大财
[01:27.66]我必须把武器藏起来
[01:30.25]来点特制饮料 我要放松心情
[01:33.69]
[01:34.28]我有很多生意要做 我们就像八十年代那样做街头生意
[01:38.26]她把男人伺候得很好 挣到了很多钱
[01:41.50]
[01:42.13]叫他们去干掉一个家伙 好兄弟一辈子
[01:45.61]
[01:46.16]我绝不会出卖灵魂 这一点我可以保证
[01:50.24]我真的想知道你在哪里
[01:54.85]我一直在做街头生意
[01:56.84]只要他愿意跟我混 他就能挣到很多票子
[01:58.72]//
[01:59.02]带她去林中别墅度假 给她抽点上好的雪茄
[02:00.97]姑娘 在我家不要穿鞋
[02:03.07]我乘坐的都是私人飞机 我现在不想在天上飞了
[02:04.97]我要在开车的时候做点刺激的事情
[02:06.65]//
[02:07.14]她不用双手 将我伺候得好舒服
[02:09.14]我的劳力士 干干净净 没镶钻石
[02:10.99]我就像是2020年的总统候选人
[02:13.22]为了干掉George Zimmerman 我决定出一百万赏金
[02:15.11]我是真正的匪帮大佬 所以她选择了瘸帮
[02:17.21]姑娘把我叫做Crisco 因为我很有名
[02:19.46]从泥潭之中挣扎出来 你休想对我指手画脚
[02:23.62]当我有街头生意做的时候 我就是街头大富豪
[02:27.31]在停车场从跑车里下来
[02:28.90]对他们说 去他的警察 去他的特警部队
[02:30.25]把所有东西统统摆出来
[02:31.82]我一路厮杀 发了大财
[02:33.34]我必须把武器藏起来
[02:35.89]来点特制饮料 我要放松心情
[02:39.22]
[02:39.92]我有很多生意要做 我们就像八十年代那样做街头生意
[02:43.95]她把男人伺候得很好 挣到了很多钱
[02:47.18]
[02:47.72]叫他们去干掉一个家伙 好兄弟一辈子
[02:51.28]
[02:51.88]我绝不会出卖灵魂 这一点我可以保证
[02:55.81]我真的想知道你在哪里
